'''The Transcendent One Returns''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5-Star [[Character]] "Lonesome Transcendence" [[Shenhe]] ({{Cryo}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table}}

==Trivia==
* All occurrences of this Wish Series have run alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Calamity Queller]], a weapon tailored to Shenhe's gameplay mechanics.
